properties.description: Kagaya uses his healing techniques to protect Inosuke Hashibira from Nezuko's attacks.

properties.description: Tanjiro trains both Nezuko and Giyu in Hinokami Kagura before their execution.

properties.context: following Tanjiro's direct confrontation with Muzan

properties.description: Sanemi and Takeda (not listed in nodes) form a pact with Nezuko to resist Muzan.
properties.context: preparation for the trial

properties.description: Hashira Sanemi Shinazugawa, Takeda Shirogane, and others enter the trial chamber.
properties.context: to test Muzan's power and siblings' spirits

properties.description: Kagaya exposes Sakonji's letter detailing Nezuko's resistance capabilities.
properties.reason: to undermine Tanjiro's plans and Giyu's rebellion

properties.description: Kagaya informs Tanjiro about his sanctioning of Giyu's actions and Muzan's influence.

properties.context: during a tense confrontation

properties.description: Kagaya employs healing spells to protect Nezuko from Tanjiro's direct assault.
properties.context: immediate crisis during trial

properties.description: Kagaya trains Nezuko in advanced Hinokami Kagura techniques.
properties.method: after Tanjiro's attack to prevent spirit collapse

properties.description: Kagaya rescues Tanjiro from the execution chamber after Nezuko's intervention.
properties.context: following Muzan's arrival and Tanjiro's desperate measures

properties.description: Sanemi Shinazugawa and Takeda Shirogane join the Hashira team for trial entry.
properties.context: preparation against Muzan's final assault

properties.description: Kagaya rescues Tanjiro from the execution chamber after he manages to flee with Nezuko.
properties.context: Muzan's arrival forces immediate action

properties.description: Nezuko resists Sanemi's taunts and later officially recognizes both siblings as Demon Slayers.
properties.context: Evidence of her bravery against enemy attacks.

properties.description: Kazuma resolves to save Shinobu after observing Kagora's actions.

properties.description: Tanjiro trains with Murata, Inosuke, and Shinobu during recovery period.

properties.description: Kagora reaffirms faith in Hashira despite Rui's deception.
properties.context: Challenge to maintain spirit strength.

properties.description: Kagora mentors Shinobu on combat techniques.

properties.description: Kagora and Shinobu encounter during recovery training.
properties.context: Shared experience as Demon Slayers.

properties.description: Hashira reflect on demon damage and Muzan's location.
properties.context: Group discussion after meeting.

properties.description: Kagora's realization that Rui is manipulating Muzan.

properties.description: Kagora vows to destroy Muzan regardless of Rui's actions.
properties.context: Unwavering faith despite setbacks.

properties.description: Kagora's spiritual awakening after meeting Shinobu.
